Research Overview: Dr. Feng‚Äôs group investigates how human genetic variation shapes complex traits, and disease susceptibility, with a focus on the functional consequences of non‚Äëcoding variants and their applications in precision medicine. His work has been published in journals such as Nature Genetics, PNAS, Molecular Biology and Evolution, and Circulation, and he has received honors including the Peking University Boya Postdoctoral Fellowship and the Chan Zuckerberg Initiative Next Generation Researcher Award.
